meta.content: If you don't have Internet, NCTC is extending their March special offer and making it easy and affordable for families with students to get Internet. We are currently in the process of creating a Google Doc that will house an updated list of cancellations and postponements. Please continue to check this Google Doc for…

body.class: home page-template-default page page-id-1 custom-background customizer-styles-applied single-author highlander-enabled highlander-light

div.div: Mission Statement: Engage * Motivate * Prepare * Inspire

li.a: Everhart Family Sargent High School Scholarship

div.class: post-1 page type-page status-publish has-post-thumbnail hentry

hr.p: If you don’t have Internet, NCTC is extending their March special offer and making it easy and affordable for families with students to get Internet.
We are currently in the process of creating a Google Doc that will house an updated list of cancellations and postponements. Please continue to check this Google Doc for updates.

p.a: Sargent Public Schools Cancellations and Postponements

h2.span: We are currently in the process of updating/changing our website. Please be patient with us while we go through this transition period. Thank you!

strong.img: Buy a bucket seat or customize a bucket seat for only $12.00! Buy them at the school’s library. A group of 5th and 6th graders are making these seats for an event coming up at ESU-10 in April called “LAUNCH Stem Into Schools”. If you are interested in helping them out they would be glad to take unused buckets off your hands (preferably not oil buckets unless clean) and they would be certainly glad to take an order and create a bucket seat for you!

div.a:
400 N 5th St
PO Box 366
Sargent, NE 68874
